def_en: If you pretend that something is the case, you act in a way that is intended to make people believe that it is the case, although in fact it is not.

def_cn: （做游戏等时）假装，假扮，装扮
def_en: If children or adults pretend that they are doing something, they imagine that they are doing it, for example as part of a game.
If you do not pretend that something is the case, you do not claim that it is the case.
